document.title: Overview
document.h1: What can i do with it?
document.p: This toolkit was developped to help developpers to integrate existing web applications and make them visible to the users as a single website.
This way of agregating contents extracted from other web sites is usually called web scraping.

HTML pages are fetched from the provider server using regular HTTP requests. Pages are then parsed to find specific delimiters used to define the blocks. The blocks are then agregated and sent to the browser as a single HTML page.
